description:
'''Pedro Anibal de Oliveira Gomes''', better known as '''Pepeu Gomes''' (born February 7, 1952, in [[Salvador, Bahia|Salvador]], Bahia state) is an accomplished Brazilian guitar player, multi-instrumentalist and composer. He was one of the members of [[Novos Baianos]].
Pepeu has already been considered by the magazine [[Guitar World]] in [[1988]] as one of the ten best guitarists in the world in the category [[world music]].
